locations.name: Stacy's
locations.description: Apparel mass-produced over-seas by underpaid workers. The markup is 100x, but there's always a 25% off sale.

actions_available.try_message: You go in to shop.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a discount shirt and pants.
actions_available.failure_message: You are asked to leave by the manager. They don't want your business, even when it's legit.

actions_available.try_message: You attempt to swipe some clothing.
actions_available.success_message: You tuck a shirt and pants under your shirt and pants.
actions_available.failure_message: A staff member follows you asking if you need help.

actions_available.try_message: You look through the bins behind the clothing chain.
actions_available.success_message: You find clothes that just went out of season.
actions_available.failure_message: A security guard comes out and tells you to leave Stacy's trash alone.

locations.name: Mama's Baked Sweets
locations.description: A local bakery that appears to be run by a family.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the bakery.
actions_available.success_message: You buy Mama's delicious baked bread.
actions_available.failure_message: A lady comes up and takes your handbasket away, then tells you to leave her bakery.

actions_available.try_message: You ask for old bread from the staff at the bakery.
actions_available.success_message: The bakery staff give you their day old bread mushed into a ball.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff say they don't have anything to give you.

actions_available.try_message: You try lifting some baked goods.
actions_available.success_message: The staff grimaced as they watched you walk out with food.
actions_available.failure_message: A lady behind the counter started screaching and pointing at you! You put the items back and hid.

actions_available.try_message: You check the bakery's trash bins.
actions_available.success_message: You find day old bread and baked goods.
actions_available.failure_message: A lady comes out to scold you for scaring staff and customers.

locations.name: MagMart
locations.description: Aisles upon aisles of soul-less products. Tons of staff working the soul-less jobs.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: You buy over-processed food.
actions_available.failure_message: A disgruntled security guard tells you to leave.

actions_available.try_message: You try begging for food in front of the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: Some people take pity and skim off extra food from their excess.
actions_available.failure_message: People are reluctant to give up their freshly purchased food.

actions_available.try_message: You try redeeming a five-finger discount.
actions_available.success_message: You easily walk out with your new stuff.
actions_available.failure_message: Even apathetic staff perked up around you. You missed a chance to swipe goods.

actions_available.try_message: You look through the bins behind the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: You find some food and other goods still wrapped up.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff loading and unloading trucks blocked you from the trash bins.

locations.name: Foods-2-Eat
locations.description: A chain grocery store. Most of the food is over-processed junk, but the shelves get restocked regularly.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a mix of fresh food and not-really-food.
actions_available.failure_message: A store manager tells you to leave before you can buy anything.

actions_available.try_message: You try asking the staff for some samples of meats and cheeses.
actions_available.success_message: You get a good helping of snacks.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff are reluctant to hand out any more free food to you.

actions_available.try_message: You try lifting some food from the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You manage to walk out with pockets stuffed with food.
actions_available.failure_message: The watchful eyes of the grocery staff prevented you from getting any food.

actions_available.try_message: You look through the bins behind the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You find food just recently passed the sell-by-date.
actions_available.failure_message: The manager comes out with a security guard to tell you to leave.

locations.name: Rundown Park
locations.description: This park doesn't get many visitors anymore. Some have taken up a semi-permanent residence.

actions_available.try_message: You try falling asleep on a secluded bench.
actions_available.success_message: You get some rest, though wake up a little sore.
actions_available.failure_message: A bored police officer prods you with his beating stick and makes you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins for food.
actions_available.success_message: You find a couple morcels to eat.
actions_available.failure_message: A police officer hovers over you until you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You offer people some of your food.
actions_available.success_message: Someone graciously accepts your help.
actions_available.failure_message: No one seems to want your help right now.

actions_available.try_message: You try to spread a message of hope and resistance.
actions_available.success_message: You connect with someone over their personal struggles.
actions_available.failure_message: The people are apathetic to you and your message.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a small spokescouncil meeting in the park.
actions_available.success_message: You organize a small meeting of like-minded people.
actions_available.failure_message: No one shows up for your meeting.

locations.name: Best Motels 17
locations.description: A basic motel chain location. Not the sketchiest one in the world, either.

actions_available.try_message: You try getting a room at the motel.
actions_available.success_message: You get a room to yourself for the night, though the neighbors aren't the best.
actions_available.failure_message: The motel manager tells you they don't have a room for you.

actions_available.try_message: You try to find an unlocked room someone left early catch a few hours of sleep before house-keeping shows up.
actions_available.success_message: You catch a few hours of sleep before house-keeping kicks you out of the room.
actions_available.failure_message: You can't find a room to crash in, even for a few hours.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins behind the motel.
actions_available.success_message: You find some leftovers dumped by the cleaning staff.
actions_available.failure_message: A member of the cleaning staff asks you to leave their garbage alone.

actions_available.try_message: You try getting a room at the hotel.
actions_available.success_message: You get a room to yourself for the night with a complimentary breakfast.
actions_available.failure_message: A hotel manager greets you coldly at check in to tell you they don't have a room for you.

actions_available.try_message: You walk out of the bathroom after a disguise change and enjoy the hotel's complimentary breakfast.
actions_available.success_message: You fill your stomach and your pockets from the breakfast buffet.
actions_available.failure_message: A member of the hotel staff asks for your room key or reservation and you make up an excuse and bail without eating.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins behind the hotel kitchen.
actions_available.success_message: You find a pile of breakfast food that was thrown away.
actions_available.failure_message: A member of the kitchen staff asks you to leave before you manage to aquire anything.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a spokescouncil meeting in the hotel.
actions_available.success_message: You successfully organize a public meeting in the hotel with catered food for attendees. It goes well!
actions_available.failure_message: The hotel cancels your reservation for your spokescouncil meeting with no explanation and refunds your money.

locations.name: W3-Deliver
locations.description: A delivery service for people ordering food or groceries within the city. It's usually pretty easy to get work here, but the pay is dependent on tips.

actions_available.try_message: You apply to do a few delivery jobs for the company.
actions_available.success_message: It's not sustainable work, but you manage to make a few tips.
actions_available.failure_message: Your application to deliver food is denied. At least you didn't waste your whole day.

actions_available.try_message: You apply to do a few delivery jobs for the company, and plan to snag the biggest delivery of the day for yourself.
actions_available.success_message: You wait until you've gotten a big grocery delivery, and take it for yourself.
actions_available.failure_message: Your application to [i]deliver[/i] goods is denied.

locations.name: iLiveHereNow
locations.description: A shared office space for start-ups grinding away people's youth and talent in the hopes of striking big for themselves.

actions_available.try_message: You try searching through the trash bins behind the office complex.
actions_available.success_message: You find extra catered food that was thrown out, and some office swag from a company layoff.
actions_available.failure_message: You don't find anything useful.

locations.name: The Preachiest Charity
locations.description: They'll take most donations. They offer 'salvation'. Sometimes they have something useful to offer.

actions_available.try_message: You offer to work at the 'charity'.
actions_available.success_message: You earn a pitiful pay and some gratitude.
actions_available.failure_message: The preacher says they need your help today.

actions_available.try_message: You go in to shop.
actions_available.success_message: You buy find some worn clothes priced very cheap.
actions_available.failure_message: You are asked to leave by the manager. They don't want your business, even when it's legit.

actions_available.try_message: You try asking for some spare clothes.
actions_available.success_message: You get some clothes that have bascially negative market value.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff get really preachy with you about your life choices, but don't give anything else.

actions_available.try_message: You offer the 'charity' some extra clothes.
actions_available.success_message: The organization graciously accepts your help.

locations.name: Luigi's Brother's Pizza
locations.description: A local pizza and Italian restaurant owned by a guy probably named Mario.

actions_available.try_message: You try to order something off the menu.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a delicious and fresh pizza.
actions_available.failure_message: The manager, probably named Mario, too, says they cannot seat you.

actions_available.try_message: You ask for any extra food from the kitchen staff.
actions_available.success_message: The kitchen staff offer you some of their expired uncooked food.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff say they don't have anything to give you.

actions_available.try_message: You try to order something off the menu and leave before the check.
actions_available.success_message: You fill your belly and duck out before the waiter notices you.
actions_available.failure_message: The manager, probably named Mario, too, says they cannot seat you.

actions_available.try_message: You check the restaurant's trash bins.
actions_available.success_message: You find food that's been discarded by patrons of the restaurant.
actions_available.failure_message: A kitchen staff member tells you to stop digging through their trash.

locations.name: Hippie Park
locations.description: Not the biggest park in the city, but a well-visited one.

actions_available.try_message: You try falling asleep on a secluded bench.
actions_available.success_message: You get some rest, though wake up a little sore.
actions_available.failure_message: A bored police officer prods you with his beating stick and makes you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins for food.
actions_available.success_message: You find a couple morcels to eat.
actions_available.failure_message: A police officer hovers over you until you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You offer people some of your food and clothing.
actions_available.success_message: Someone graciously accepts your help.
actions_available.failure_message: No one seems to want your help right now.

actions_available.try_message: You try to spread a message of hope and resistance.
actions_available.success_message: You connect with someone over their personal struggles.
actions_available.failure_message: The people are apathetic to you and your message.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a small spokescouncil meeting in the park.
actions_available.success_message: You organize a small meeting of like-minded people.
actions_available.failure_message: No one shows up for your meeting.

locations.name: World-Ending Coffee
locations.description: A chain cafe that offers recreational and legal stimulants ground from definitely ethically traded beans.

actions_available.try_message: You try to order something off the menu.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a coffee and down it.
actions_available.failure_message: The cafe says it cannot serve you today.

actions_available.try_message: You ask for any extra food from the staff.
actions_available.success_message: The staff offer you a day old croissant.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff say they don't have anything to give you.

actions_available.try_message: You check the cafe's trash bins.
actions_available.success_message: You find some ungrounded beans.
actions_available.failure_message: A cafe staff member tells you to stop digging through their trash.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a small spokescouncil meeting in the cafe.
actions_available.success_message: You organize a small meeting of like-minded people.
actions_available.failure_message: No one shows up for your meeting.

locations.name: Church of Saints
locations.description: A small church for some Christian denomination. Sometimes they do some charitable work.

actions_available.try_message: You try asking for some spare food.
actions_available.success_message: You get some wafers.
actions_available.failure_message: The priest offers you salvation through the word- you walk away.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a spokescouncil meeting in the church.
actions_available.success_message: You successfully rent the church space to organize a public meeting with food. Some people attend.
actions_available.failure_message: The church cancels your reservation for your spokescouncil meeting, but keeps your money as a donation.

locations.name: City Park
locations.description: The biggest park in the city! It is packed with visitors at all hours, and regularly patrolled.

actions_available.try_message: You try falling asleep on a secluded bench.
actions_available.success_message: You get some rest, though wake up a little sore.
actions_available.failure_message: A bored police officer prods you with his beating stick and makes you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins for food.
actions_available.success_message: You find a couple morcels to eat.
actions_available.failure_message: A police officer hovers over you until you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You offer people some of your food and clothing.
actions_available.success_message: Someone graciously accepts your help.
actions_available.failure_message: No one seems to want your help right now.

actions_available.try_message: You try to spread a message of hope and resistance.
actions_available.success_message: You connect with someone over their personal struggles.
actions_available.failure_message: The people are apathetic to you and your message.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a large spokescouncil meeting in the park.
actions_available.success_message: You organize a large meeting of like-minded people.
actions_available.failure_message: No one shows up for your meeting.

actions_available.try_message: You apply to do clean-up work at the bar.
actions_available.success_message: You manage to make some money for your time.
actions_available.failure_message: Your application to do bar cleaning was denied.

actions_available.try_message: You go to buy a drink.
actions_available.success_message: You buy some liquid confidence.
actions_available.failure_message: The bartender says they're tapped out.

locations.name: La Cuisine So French
locations.description: A classy, pretentious, and expensive restaurant to eat at.

actions_available.try_message: You try to order something off the menu.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a meal of tiny proportions. Like it's good, but more would be better.
actions_available.failure_message: The hostess says they cannot seat you.

actions_available.try_message: You try to order something off the menu and leave before the check.
actions_available.success_message: You enjoy some hors d'oeuvre and leave before the waiter expects it.
actions_available.failure_message: The hostess says they cannot seat you.

actions_available.try_message: You check the restaurant's trash bins.
actions_available.success_message: You find food that's been discarded by patrons of the restaurant.
actions_available.failure_message: A kitchen staff member tells you to stop digging through their trash.
